summary: This module implements a vector tile data source class that retrieves vector tiles, optionally caches them, and transforms the tile contents into GeoJSON geometries using shapely utilities. It provides the necessary interface for raster vision pipelines to access and manipulate vector map data.
business_intent: Allow computer‑vision and geospatial analysis workflows to incorporate up‑to‑date vector map information by abstracting tile fetching and conversion to a standard GeoJSON format.
